RLDA Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Manager/ Assistant Manager Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 28, 2025, 14:21 IST
 RailTel Corporation of India Limited
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 28-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 70,000 to 140,000




FOLLOW

The Rail Land Development Authority (RLDA) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Manager/ Assistant Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, LLB can apply for the RLDA Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

RLDA Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Manager/ Assistant Manager	01	Any Degree, LLB

RLDA Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

RLDA Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

RLDA Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

RLDA Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 70,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,40,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the RLDA Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the RLDA Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Deputy General Manager (HR), Rail Land Development Authority, Unit No.702-B, 7th Floor, Konnectus Tower-II, DMRC Building, Ajmeri Gate, Delhi-110002.

Important Dates:

Starting date	27-08-2025
Closing date	26-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Application Form	Click Here
